<@page_overview_title/> <#assign groovy = "org.duguo.xdir.core.internal.template.freemarker.GroovyDirective"?new()> <@groovy> def oauthParams=["_oauth_callback_url":model.pagePath+"/callback"+model.format+"?go="+java.net.URLEncoder.encode(model.getStringParameter("go"), "UTF-8")] model.pageProperties.each(){ key,value-> if(key.startsWith("_oauth_")) oauthParams[key]=value.displayableValue } json=model.app.security.get("oauth").retrieveAuthorizeUrl(model.request,oauthParams); model.put("json",json); authUrl = json.authorizeUrl; if(authUrl.isNull()){ return "Failed to talk to OAuth, please try again later."; }else{ model.response.sendRedirect(authUrl.toString()); } return "" <#if !json.authorizeUrl.isNull()> <#stop "redirected to login"/>
